text.text_translated: Asteroids are rocks that fly through space. Some of these are dangerous. These dangerous asteroids come close enough to Earth's path around the sun, less than 7.5 million kilometres away. NASA has made a map of 1,400 of these dangerous asteroids. People do not expect any of them to be a danger in the next one hundred years. NASA can follow these objects and make guesses about a possible hit. They do this using tools and systems which are already available. If an asteroid might hit, two ways to protect Earth could be used.
